Instruction: Wash and peel carrot. Slice it thinly.
Wash and slice cucumber and red bell pepper thinly.
Spread hummus evenly over the whole wheat tortilla.
Layer lettuce leaves, carrot slices, cucumber slices, and red bell pepper slices on top of the hummus.
Roll the tortilla tightly, folding in the sides as you go.
Slice the wrap diagonally and serve.
